Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.models

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.common.models.Cell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Cell class, each cell is the atom of the board, some cells are spawnpoint, the others are just normal cells which have an ammo card on it, more cells compose a room and more rooms compose the game board.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
